name: Haunted Art Studio
description:
Arcade, endless shooter with a puzzle twist

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 jam.

 

The game jam's theme was "Joined Together"

This game explores this theme by having the player join together primary colors to create secondary colors, whilst shooting enemies

 

This game is for anyone who likes endless arcade shooters with a wierd artsy twist!

 

This game is also for anyone who would like to play as an unfortunate pig child....

HOW TO PLAY INSTRUCTIONS:

CREDITS:

Programming and Art (2d and 3d): Riti Bhatwal

Music (grabbed for free from unity asset store): "Complete Music Collection Free"
